while not an active volunteer, michael tries to engage in community events and stay informed on local issues. he frequently uses the internet to stay up-to-date on news and financial information, checking various websites and apps several times a day.

overall, michael's political views are shaped by his urban, educated, and financially secure background, as well as his personal experiences and values. he believes in finding a balance between progressive social policies and responsible economic management, though he leans more towards liberal ideologies on most issues.
